name: Back to Back (Remarci, Vdor01)
description:
Back to Back

Can you reach the end? And again?

Here, it's not enough to reach the end of each level, but you'll have to go back to the start. With a little twist...

The game is tested and beatable.

Controls Move left
A / LEFT ARROWMove right
D / RIGHT ARROW
JumpSPACERestart from checkpointBACKSPACEReset the current levelDELETEOpen menuTAB
